Body: i am new in android development and i am assigned a task to create an application using android studio that will share screen from one android device to other.concept:an application that will help user to access their friends or client screen no audio no file transfer just screen share please give me idea how i can achieve this goal what kind of library i should use.Note* there are some android application available that share screen from tab to desktop to phone to desktop but i am unable to get such application.  Dear Members you assistance will be very helpful for me please pay attention.Thanks Regards Hassan Gillani
Title: How to share screen from on android phone to other
